Package com.BrickBreaker.element.ball

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
com.BrickBreaker.element.ball.Ball
Direct Known Subclasses:
RubberBall
public abstract class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
This is the abstract Ball class to store variable to generate ball
Since:
3/11/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alden Sia Zheng Heng

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB, java.awt.Color inner, java.awt.Color border)
      The Constructor of the Ball class. Assign the parameter and set to the variable.
      Parameters:
      center - The center of point of the ball
      radiusA - The horizontal radius for creating the ball
      radiusB - The vertical radius for creating the ball
      inner - The inner color for filling the ball
      border - The color for painting the border
